text: Agelak agak, Bɨ kɨli Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgtep gep okok, kɨli ogɨnap God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab takaw ak, nɨgtep gɨpal agak. Bɨ anɨb okok, kɨli bɨ kal nap nɨb olap tek agak. Ne kal mɨgan ne amɨl tap nedil ak dɨl, tap koŋɨm ak dɨl, tap teplep anɨb okok mɨdupsek dɨl dad seŋ ownɨgab agak.
